title: Start
body:
What are you?
-> A troll
    <<set $troll to true >>
-> A nice person
    <<set $troll to false >>
[[Objective]]

title: Objective
body:
<<if $repeat >= 3>>
Byeâ€¦
<<else>>
Is your objective clear?
[[Yes|Objective.Yes]]
[[No|Objective.No]]
<<if $troll == true>>
[[Maybe|Objective.Maybe]]
<<endif>>
<<endif>>

title: BasicIfElseIfElse
body:
<<set $testvar = 321>>
Text before
<<if $testvar == 123>>Inside if<<elseif $testvar == 1>>Inside elseif<<else>>Inside else<<endif>>Text after

title: OptionAfterSuccessConditional
body:
<<set $haskey to true>>
Text before
<<if $haskey == true>>
Inside if
<<endif>>
Text after
[[FinalOption|Objective]]

title: OptionAfterOptionWithinConditional
body:
<<set $haskey to true>>
Text before
<<if $haskey == true>>
Inside if
[[Give key|give.key]]
<<endif>>
Text after
[[FinalOption|Objective]]

title: give.key
body: You give the key to the troll.
